item.title:
RT by @EOTR: A compliation for true festival lovers.

@EOTR founder Simon Taffe returns with ongoing series: 'Between the Music', his personal compilation of the obscure and classic, all heard at End Of The Road festival.

Pre-ordering on white vinyl.

https://roughtrade.com/gb/various/end-of-the-road-presents-between-the-music/lp-plus-x2

item.title:
R to @EOTR: When End of the Road first began, he was determined that his festival would not make the same oversight. We try to think about all the little details that make a festival the unique experience it should be and the music played between the live music is no exception.

(3/4)
item.dc:creator: @EOTR
item.description:
When End of the Road first began, he was determined that his festival would not make the same oversight. We try to think about all the little details that make a festival the unique experience it should be and the music played between the live music is no exception.

(3/4)

item.title:
R to @EOTR: The festival‚Äôs curator, Simon Taffe has distinct memories of going to other events that hadn‚Äôt given much thought to the music playing between performers; the repetition of it, the sudden jolt of it. 

(2/4)

item.title:
‚ÄúWhat was that song playing two songs before Mac DeMarco came on?‚Äù

It was in answer to persistent queries like the one above that End of the Road decided to launch the first of what will be an ongoing compilation series: Between the Music.

(1/4)

item.title:
Keen on this year's Literature lineup?

Don't make your way to Effing Forest just yet. 2022's talks will take place on the Talking Heads - where comedy also happens. So grab a drink, grab a pal and grab a comfortable seat down there.

https://buff.ly/2VADrqD

item.title:
@chrisleehutson took up guitar at age 12 and soon started self-recording on a four-track in his bedroom, largely inspired by the DIY sensibilities of artists like Elliott Smith. We've been listening to Quitters non-stop.

You should do the same: https://buff.ly/3wjq6EG
item.dc:creator: @EOTR
